description:
As fslint has not been updated to 20.04, I have tried every File Dup App I can find. DO NOT TRY THIS ONE. 
Go ahead, add a folder to scan, then I nicely shows you the duplicates.
HOWEVER, if the folder you have scanned is Larger then 300Mb, IT WILL NOT ALLOW YOU TO DO ANYTHING. IT POPS-UP TO SAY "BUY THE FULL VERSION"
I wish I was allowed to curse and swear in these reviews.
This developer is %&^$#%$%^&%^#$%^& !
summary: DO NOT USE - Less than One Star

description: I tried the free version of this to start with and I liked what I saw so when I got my new computer I bought the paid version. Their customer service has been great. I had a few problems installing this on my Pop-os system but with a few emails back and forth I got it to come through. If you are having problems getting it installed or anything else contact them. It might take a little patience emailing back and forth but they do answer you back and they are very helpful. Anybody complaining about the free version read the fine print it is limited. They are telling you the truth. If you want all the features buy the full version.
this software is dead easy to use. the algorithm they use 99% of the time picks the duplicate copy I want to delete. fast and easy.
summary: so easy to use - I bought it

I use Ubuntu for a reason: I like free stuff. This app advertises the premium version on the top bar and limits you to deleting 300 MB of dups per folder. I'll use somethjign else. 
Otherwise, the UI is nice, accesed external drives once allowed in permissions for the snap.

Yes, the application is speedy. It finds duplicates and allows you to review file information to help decide which duplicate to delete (one is pre-selected).

Some folders cannot be evaluated by using the Add Folder button, but they CAN be evaluated if you use Drag and Drop.

I have used Ubuntu for a long time now, and sometimes I just try out sofware that wouldn´t try instantly. Speedy is indeed very fast and pleasing to work with. For now, I only tested the search and compare. Deleting and comparing files, I will do in a later stage. What would be helpful to know is, is what technology the software uses to decide duplicates. Lets say duplicate file with different annotations. That use case is something that I want to test thoroughly. Adjusting file permissions in software center makes the software interact with removable media.

As with any software, the free version only gives you a taste but with great limitations. I decided to buy the Linux version instead of the Windows version. I'm sure the Windows version does not exhibit one flaw I encountered. 

When opening a file, the app sometimes locks up. Other times on the pop up to select the program to open your selected file, left clicking your mouse on the option will not work. It would not even click on the cancel button. I eventually figured it out. I used the keyboard keys, and the process continued. This is my only complain. Besides that, It's a GREAT program to find duplicates. I was going to buy the entire suite to support the developer, but I just didn't have a need for most of the other options. Viewnior also works well, and it's free, but the interface on this one is superior. Great job to the developer. Thank you. 4 stars only because of the glitch I noticed, otherwise a 5!!
summary: Works great with a nice GUI

description: Find duplicates fast yes, but the free version is quite useless unless you can't delete the dupes. I won't pay 29$ for the linux version of a duplicate finder - you can buy actually a 1 Terrabyte Harddisk for that price and the duplicates found are just a couple of Gigabytes.
Diese Anwendung ist für fast alle Nutzer unnötig, da sie leider nur Duplikate findet, welche sich auf die Bennenung von Ordnern bezieht und nicht auf deren Inhalt, was viel interessanter wäre.
als kostenlose version nicht zu gebrauchen. es können nur datenmengen bis 500mb gelöscht werden.
summary: als kostenlose version nicht zu gebrauchen

I recommend you to download fclones. It doesn't have a GUI, but it is way better and of course free!
Me gusta por lo rápido.

Rapide, pas mal fait, un utilitaire pour se débarrasser des doublons est très utile pour gagner de l'espace de stockage, et il n'en existe pas beaucoup avec une interface graphique, malheureusement avec cette version de Speedy Finder Duplicate on ne peut qu'enlever 300 mb de fichiers inutiles, pas plus à la fois, il faudra passer à la version complète et donc payante, pour avoir accès à toutes ses fonctionnalités.
summary: Pas mal c'est là une version de démo

description: Crashe à chaque lancement de scan sur Ubuntu 20.04, en plus ça reste une démo qui limite dans des fonctions comme la suppression des doublons. Passez votre chemin et tentez Schredder, l'interface de rmlint, qui semble bien marcher, et qui est libre et donc ne vous limite pas dans des fonctions basiques.
summary: Crashe à chaque lancement de scan sur Ubuntu 20.04

description:
Unfortunaltly, unable to perform searches in mounted veracrypt modules.
So for me, it's rather useless (give us flint back !)
summary: Does not work on veracrypt volumes

description:
La version démo est trop limitée et ne permet même pas de se rendre compte du potentiel du logiciel.
Au moins, elle n'a pas planté, mais c'est comme si le scan était incapable d'aller chercher dans les sous-dossiers les doublons... ce qui limite quand même pas mal l'utilité de l'outil.
summary: Ne vaut pas le coup en démo

description: Ubuntu 20.04 Crashe au démarrage, ne prend pas le volume en considération
Достаточно быстро находит дубликаты, групирует по типам и дает возможность проверить что и где лежит. При удаление файлов свыше 300 Мб , необходимо приобретать полную версию

Запустил сканирование папки в которой находилось 71 818 объектов, после того как эта программа показала что просканировала более 160 000 объектов остановил сканирование из-за его не реальности.
Программа не в духе свободных+бесплатных программ. Она в духе "мы хотим ваши деньги, по этому вот вам ограниченная наживка, в ней мы будем впаривать платную версию". В меню содержится список других программ разработчика, видимо для их рекламы.
При поптыке открыть файл система подвешивается. А так все красиво.)
